name: @sds/design-tokens
description: Design tokens for the SDS Design System - multi-platform output (CSS, JSON, JS, SCSS)

scripts.build: npm run tokens:build && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.watch: npm run tokens:build && npm run build:js -- --watch
scripts.bootstrap:analyze: node -e "import('./src/bootstrap/token-analyzer.js').then(m => { const analyzer = new m.TokenAnalyzer(); analyzer.loadTokens().then(() => console.log(JSON.stringify(analyzer.generateReport(), null, 2))); })"
scripts.bootstrap:watch: npm run bootstrap:build && chokidar 'tokens/**/*.json' 'src/bootstrap/**/*.js' -c 'npm run bootstrap:build'
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run bootstrap:build
